pages.text: If $(l:signs_abilities/selection_wheel)selected$(), the Witcher can press $(6)$(l)[$(k:origins.ternary_active)]$() $(l)(Origins: Ternary Active)$() to cast Aard - a telekinetic thrust that will damage and knockback enemies, and $(l:signs_abilities/aard#page_aard_blockstates)alter some blockstates$() in a cone in front of the Witcher. Knockback resistant opponents will resist the effects of Aard. Aard has a cooldown of 10s after being cast.

pages.title: Cooldown Bar
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Aard is able to reflect some projectiles if timed correctly!

pages.title: Aard - Blockstates
pages.text: Aard will affect certain blocks when they are caught in the radius of the sign:$(li)Lava is cooled and turned into Basalt.$(li)Fires are extinguished.$(li)Lit Campfires, Candles and Candle Cakes will extinguish if you look at them while casting.
